nodes.text: AX/RX was a modified MD-series medical specialist droid owned by Kh'aris Fenn and was active in 30 BBY. Kh'aris used it as a torture droid, utilizing its knowledge of the anatomy to inflict maximum pain.

Fenn used AX/RX to make Jedi Master Tholme surrender. Kh'aris ordered the droid to keep torturing the Jedi until he was oblivious. After Tholme used the Force to drop his life signs, AX/RX put the Jedi in a prison cell with Nat Secura.

When Quinlan Vos and Aayla Secura infiltrated Kh'aris' fortress, Kh'aris ordered the execution of his two prisoners. Tholme resisted but AX/RX electronic defense mechanism killed the Jedi—at least that was what AX/RX determined. When AX/RX neared Nat, Tholme stood up and used his Force powers to throw AX/RX into the prison wall. AX/RX survived and began shocking the Jedi again only to be beheaded by another Jedi, Aayla Secura.
